Posts.Content: Everyone should do what they feel is best for them. I'm sure you can find a physician who will order whatever tests you want as long as you assure them you'll self pay. I'm assuming you didn't have a 3D mammo.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: Well, I do have some experience and I have had cysts and had to have multiple mammos and u/s as a result. All of the testing came out the same. Fibroid cysts. Getting off caffeine (which I ingested a great deal of daily at the time) did away with them. I never once considered going further with biopsies, etc. But then there is no incidence of any female cancers in my family so I'm not greatly at risk. That was also part of my decision process.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: Do you have a gyno? I'd start there.
Posts.Title: Just been diagnosed but got rash on one breast and worried

Posts.Content: I know this can be scary. It may be that you are one of those people who are prone to fobroid cysts. But you are being very proactive and getting ahead of whatever it may be...and sounds like you have a great doctor also.
Posts.Title: Moving Fast abnormal mammo

Posts.Content: i've had 2 abnormal paps in my life. Both times they retested after 6months and all was fine. I"d wait if I were you.
Posts.Title: Complex Cystic Mass & Breast Biopsy

Posts.Content: Have you been tested for the gene mutation for familial breast cancer?
Posts.Title: mammogram question

Posts.Content: You certainly can have almost any test you want. Your insurance may not pay for it so you would need be prepared to self pay but I'm sure you could find a way to get it. Talk with your gyno.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: Are you talking about Tamoxifen? What effects?
Posts.Title: breast cancer five year pill

Posts.Content: Sounds reasonable. Come back and let us know how it goes.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: In all your reasearch on your cysts ,I'm surprised you never ran across the term fibroid cysts as they are the most common type of breast cysts. Very common in younger women, esp adolescents. My breast was sore in one spot. They did a mammo, a "super" mammo (more compression) and an ultrasound all in the same visit. Because of the testing and the manual exam which showed that it was moveable and very small, it was left to me to decide if I wanted it removed. Since they would have had to remove a large amount of breast tissue at the top left of the right breast to get to it(toward the armpit) that would disfigure my breast (no reconstructive ssurgery back then for this sort of thing), I elected to listen to my gyno and surgeon and do nothing. They feel caffeine constributes to the pain so I stopped it. (worse than when I quit smoking). It eventually went away. Most do. End of story.
Posts.Title: can you have a breast ultrasound even if a diagnostic mammogram doesn't show anything

Posts.Content: Yes, I had that happen over 35 years ago. Hasn't changed in all these years...still a fribroid cyst - I guess. It obviously isn't cancer....
Posts.Title: Diagnosing a lump as benign w/o a biopsy?

Posts.Content: Because there were atypical cells and they could not complete an analysis for a clearer dx.
Posts.Title: High Risk?

Posts.Content: I would get tested and then decide.
Posts.Title: Prophylactic mastectomy

Posts.Content: i'd see your gyno
Posts.Title: Should I see GP

Posts.Content: Also, do you use caffeine? If so, that can make cysts more painful. I gave up caffeine partially because of a breast cyst that was very painful all the time. Just a thought.
Posts.Title: How was your BC diagnosed?

Posts.Content: If you have a derm you normally use, I'd just go see them about having it removed. It probably is a skin tag of some sort.
Posts.Title: Growth on tip of nipple

Posts.Content: You've seen the ultrasounds of pregnant women? Everything the wand passes over is captured on the screen. So not to worry.
Posts.Title: Ultrasound on lump

Posts.Content: Sounds like gas pains.I get them sometimes - not as much as I used to - but they can about bring you to your knees.
Posts.Title: Shooting Pain Under Left Breast

Posts.Content: She must have moved it around some as that's how u/s are done...not just a spot. If you still have concerns, please verbalize them to your doctor when you review the film with him.
Posts.Title: Ultrasound on lump

Posts.Content: You should have genetic testing done if that hasn't been done. There are several breast cancer genes that have been identified.
Posts.Title: Could this be genetic?

Posts.Content: If it is a cyst, that can make the u/s uncomfortable as cysts do get sore. This is particularly true if you use caffeine. So a couple of cups of coffee b/4 the u/s could be the culprit.
Posts.Title: Two Positive Mammogram's, Third One Negative, Two positive Ultrasounds

Posts.Content: If it's a cyst,you need to get off caffeine altogether. I had to. It just hurts too much....
Posts.Title: Two Positive Mammogram's, Third One Negative, Two positive Ultrasounds

Posts.Content: There are many reasons why they recommend this but usually because the cancer has the likelihood of spreading or has already spread. And yes, they can confirm this thru testing. Am sorry your loved one has to go thru this but it is necessary to save her life.
Posts.Title: Chemeotherapy for breast cancer

Posts.Content: I've had them redo them before because one wasn't clear or she didn't the whole breast - mine are small so it's had to get it all on the plate! If they had seen something they wanted to take a closer look at, they probably would have done a ultrasound right then. They've done t hat twice to me as I have a fibroid cyst in one.
Posts.Title: HELP - mammogram tech scared me!

Posts.Content: Interesting. The facility I use typically doesn't let you leave until they check the film and make sure they don't need anything else at that time. I have had to have an ultrasound twice but they did them right then.
Posts.Title: mammogram recall

Posts.Content: OOOH! Not good to wear nothing a but a sports bra. That might be your problem. Try wearing a regular bra for a while nad see if it helps.
Posts.Title: pain under my left breast :( - what could it be?

Posts.Content: I don't know what it is but it definitely must be checked out. Please see that she sees her gyno.
Posts.Title: Help for Someone Else

Posts.Content: It could just be a cyst or an infection. Either could be resolved easily but could be dangerous if left alone. So it doesn't have to be the "c" word to be serious. And there are many more options that "c" so the odds are in her favor.
Posts.Title: Help for Someone Else

Posts.Content: Glad you got more information. It's good to have a clear baseline to compare to in the future! Keep us posted.
Posts.Title: mammogram recall

Posts.Content: Probably nothing but if it gives you peace, there's nothing wrong with a second opinion.
Posts.Title: "Focal Asymmetry"

Posts.Content: Perhaps then, in order to soothe your mind, you should ask for another biopsy. We each have to determine for ourselves how much reassurance we need.
Posts.Title: complicated breast cysts , mammogram in 6 months ?

Posts.Content: With digital equipment they usually don't have to call you back; they go one and do the extra testing then. I've had that happen several times as I have dense breasts and a fibroid cyst. So, I wouldn't say it's common but it isn't unusual to have a more high resolution mammogram and/or u/s. Obviously their radiologists are very good and want to be certain if they see something. I wouldn't be too worried at this point.
Posts.Title: Repeat mamogram

Posts.Content: According to NIH (National Institutes of Health), "breast cancer presenting as a complicated cyst by ultrasound was rare (0.4%, 95% confidence interval 0-1.94%)" as determined thru their research. It was determined that it is so rare as not to require further testing. I'd go with that and your doctor's recommendation and not give it another thought.
Posts.Title: complicated breast cysts , mammogram in 6 months ?

Posts.Content: No. It means the image is clear and it doesn't have to be redone or clarified. You'll get a letter later after the radiologist has read it and forwarded the info to your doctor. I suggest that you use a facility that has the mammogram read by 2 radiologists rather than just one. Most are going to that these days.
Posts.Title: Are Mammograms read right away?

Posts.Content: WE simply call it 3D mammogram here in the US. It has about the same radiation as a regular mammogram. Here in the US they usually do both at the same time and hence the "little more" than normal radiation. However, the two together is less radiation than a CT of the head. And the idea is that the 3D one will result in less need for follow up mammograms after the originals are read. There is a lot of information out there about this if you feel inclined to do a search.
Posts.Title: Mammography vs Tomosynthesis

Posts.Content: Sounds like that is what's going on. Have any of your doctors told you to get off caffeine? It can make the cysts more painful.
Posts.Title: Is this fibrocystic breast pain?

Posts.Content: Many states require by law that the imaging centers notify women who have dense breasts. Alabama does and that's a good thing so that we know things can hide in there so we need to be vigilant about getting our mamograms...and 3D if at all possible!!!
Posts.Title: Is this fibrocystic breast pain?

Posts.Content: No! You can still have the puppy. Why on earth would you think not? First of all, I don't know how they do it in the UK but you could just have a cyst. Or, since it's your first mammo, they just may want to get a higher resolution one for your baseline. If it was something they thought was very serious, you would have gotten a phone call, not a letter. You are way jumping overboard on this. I'd just take it in stride. If you have dense breasts, they might also want another. So many reasons that are just nothing. Good luck and I'm sure it will turn out fine.
Posts.Title: mammogram recall

Posts.Content: Breast cancer normally is not painful. So, odds are it's some sort of calcification or cyst. Since it's hurting in the same spot on the other breast, are you sure it isn't from your bra? Or lack of one if you don't wear one all the time?
Posts.Title: Breast pain and scared, please help!

Posts.Content: Cafffeine is probably the worst thing for them. Are you on it?
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: It could be just a cyst but even that should be monitored. Go to the gyno, get a mammogram, and find out for sure.
Posts.Title: Not Diagnosed ... Just have questions.

Posts.Content: I assume you are using B9 for benign....did they do a biopsy? I am also assume it was an enlarged lymph node...it's sort of hard to tell exactly what you are talking about but but if it was, then sure, I'd believe him. I've had the same small fibroid cyst show up on my mammo since I was 35 years old...and I'm almost 64 now. It never changes...and they'd make a mess getting it out so there's no point in it. Since your mother had breast cancer, have you been tested for the gene?
Posts.Title: Doc told me just a B9 lymph node come back in 12 months

Posts.Content: Since your mother had it, I strongly suggest you get tested for the gene. You can always have the lymph node removed...
Posts.Title: Doc told me just a B9 lymph node come back in 12 months

Posts.Content: Could be a cyst. Do you use caffeine? Try getting off and see if the pain goes away. That's an indicator. But do get it checked out. Hopefully you have a previous mammo they can compare to..
Posts.Title: Pain & small lump

Posts.Content: Breast cancer is a disease that can kill you....a growth that is not supposed to be there. Buds are the beginnings of a breast itself...not a disease.
Posts.Title: Difference btwn. Breast Bud and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Sure - sometimes. It just all depends on how big they get and how painful.
Posts.Title: waiting for core needle biopsy results 1 2

Posts.Content: I don't think you need to go to that extreme. Again, the 3D mammo machine gives much more detailed and clearer pictures. If you can find a facility that has one, I'd go there in the future. that's what I do.
Posts.Title: Dense Breast

Posts.Content: Do you use caffeine? If it's a cyst,the caffeine will aggravate it and make it hurt more. I had to quit ccaffeine due to mine.
Posts.Title: Pain in left breast

Posts.Content: Some states - Alabama is one- require that they tell you if you have dense breasts. So every year that statement is on my letter. The facility I use has you wait and they will call you in for more testing right then if they see something like this. That way you don't have to go back days later for the ultrasound. Happens to me periodically as I have a fibroid cyst. Not all facilities have 3D mammo units yet but I would check and see if any in your town do and use those in the future.
Posts.Title: Dense Breast
